website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective way to leap upward from trickle chargers and decrease EV charging time without having to rewire the house.
pros: Plugs directly into a NEMA 6-20 outlet
The 20-foot charging cord reaches from outlet to EV fairly well
Doesn’t need to be mounted, and can be carried along in the car
240-volt capacity charges EV batteries much faster than standard 110-volt, reducing charging time by up to half
cons: May need to replace standard 240-volt outlet with a compatible NEMA 6-20
Limited to 16 amps, much less than fixed units in the level 2 charging range

customer_reviews.title: Bite the Bullet and Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: After using this charger cord for about 6 weeks, I can say that this has worked really much better than expected. I have a 240 outlet just inside my garage door (for a table saw), I run the cord under the door to charge my Leaf. Works great, Charges up way faster than the the 120V. I bought it through Amazon Warehouse, the original box was messed up but everything was there and I saved $100.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as Promised!
customer_reviews.text: I use this 240 volt charger on my 2012 Chevy Volt. It's been great. My dealer wanted me to buy the Bosch GM Voltec. More complicated to have my electrician install, requiring 40 amps and with quite negative reviews - especially reliability - I went on Amazon to see what else I could find. The TurboCord looked like a possibility. In checking their website, I found it only requires 20 amps which in my older house meant a great savings in wiring. Voile ! I have not had one bit of trouble with a failed charge or blown circuit on 20 amps. I'm also charging in 3.3 hrs just as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I've used the charger everyday with my 2012 Nissan Leaf ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the charger everyday with my 2012 Nissan Leaf. Charge times are faster than the ETA on the dash, and if you understand common NEMA 240v wiring, installing a plug at a friend's house takes a matter of minutes. In sub freezing weather I had problems with the charger, it would charge for only a few minutes before giving up. I took the charger inside and after a few minutes the ice melted and found water to be dripping out of the cracks in the plastic. This was concerning, but after drying, the charger continued to work and still does months later.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Cord
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Turbo-Cord August 2015. I only use the cord once a day in my garage. I have a dedicated outlet for the charger. I have had to already return the plug and get a replacement because the cord stopped working. I now have a similar problem with the replacement plug which will require me talking to customer service then to technical support and likely to replace the cord and mail the old cord back. I am honestly unclear why there is such fragility to these plugs if in fact they are made for much harsher treatment than I am currently applying to the cords.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Aquino

customer_reviews.title: The charger is a perfect fit for our 2015 Leaf
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this charger for a few weeks now but it works as advertised. The charger is a perfect fit for our 2015 Leaf. The hanging rack comes with a pair of screws but I elected not to use them since they were so long. My only knock on the product is with said rack. If you're providing screws, a pair of pre-drilled holes wouldn't be the end of the world. But honestly, that's such a minor thing. I'm holding out giving the charger a full five stars until we've had it longer and can ensure it doesn't stop working for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: David Blais

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Well Made Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast compared to the standard model that came with the new Ford vehicle. It has a flashing light that tells the user the vehicle is charging and then it turns solid when the vehicle is fully charged. The charge is also the fastest one on the market. When I need a complete charge, the unit is done in about 2.5-3 hours compared to 7-9 hours for the standard cord charge. I highly recommend this product for all electric car users.
customer_reviews.author: Henry D

customer_reviews.title: Small and Compact but Broke after 3 Years
customer_reviews.text: The charger is small and compact and works as intended. You don't need to install a huge clunky station to achieve the same result. The only downside is that it broke after 3 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Blk_Kodo

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer, perfect for our pre-wired garage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's Kia Niro since we already had a NEMA 6-20 outlet in our garage. No electrician needed! I did have to get an extension cord due to the location of the outlet, but that puts the plug right by the garage door, which is fine since we leave our cars outside 24/7. The cord is more than long enough to reach the car's socket without stretching. I took away one star because the cord is a somewhat thinner gauge, compared to other cables of this type, but so far it performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K.

customer_reviews.title: Over price for small cord. It get warm during ...
customer_reviews.text: Over price for small cord. It get warm during the duration of charge for Prius Prime but nothing goes wrong so far. This is my spare charger and I have not use everyday charge. I would give 5 stars if the cord is larger gauge.
customer_reviews.author: amazingonline

customer_reviews.title: I'm now able to charge my Ford Fusion electric and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm now able to charge my Ford Fusion electric and Toyota Prius plug-in, in about 2 1/2 hours. Using the factory provided charging cord it use to take 5-7 hours. My decision to buy this charger despite the price has been well it. I haven't had to buy gas for my cars the past month of commuting 20 miles a day to work. I quickly charge up my car at home and again at work. I wish the 20 foot cord was another 5 feet longer though
customer_reviews.author: VITATAZ

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how small this is compaired to the others out there.
customer_reviews.text: Great cord, charges my PHEV in about 3.5-4 hours. I bought this one based on my experience with the same one used at our office, it lives out side in 115 degree summers and has survived 5 years and is still going. I hope to have the same results with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Real Name

customer_reviews.title: After a four months of infrequent use, the charger ...
customer_reviews.text: After a four months of infrequent use, the charger stopped working. I had my electrician look at it and he said micro switch is faulty! I spent almost 500$ no this for four months! No return No help No way would I order this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes! AeroVironment TurboCord 240
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. Works great with our Nissan Leaf. And, by using the Leaf computer to schedule our charges during the cheap electricity hours (usually between midnight and 6:00am), our EV charges are running only about 28%-30% of what we were previously paying for gasoline. Bottom line: Cost savings, plus contributing to a cleaner atmosphere makes this AeroVironment TurboCord 240 a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Synnott

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not Fit Description
customer_reviews.text: The product description stated that this charger can be used as a 120v or 240v charger. When there was no converter for 120v I called the manufacturer and was told that I needed to return this product and purchase another model for $300 more to be able to use the charger on a 120v outlet. Terrible customer service!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No match to 120v chargers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 2015 Focus Electric and it makes such a difference. I researched many chargers and decided on this one for its compact size. I am a bit confused as to why they charge $599.99 for such a small charger. 30amp chargers will charge even quicker and there are some models for 449.00 and up. I will stick with this model since our car can be programmed for off peak timed charging. Some wall chargers offer timer options which this model does not offer. I sure hope it last for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt from SD

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to and very well. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to and very well. Only drawback was the large plug head. I installed an outdoor receptacle with a rain cover, but had to cut out portions of the box for the head to fit in. Still it works.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Faucher

customer_reviews.title: FAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's new 2016 Fusion Energi. Installation of a dedicated 240v 20amp circuit was simple enough. Have used now 4 times and the charge time is about 2 hours from empty to full. Very well made and like the light on the plug to show if it's charging or not. Would highly recommend as I feel letting the car control the charger is the better way to go especially given how easy it is to configure the charging settings with the car / MyFordMobile app
customer_reviews.author: NH Proud

customer_reviews.title: Feeds my EVs at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to it being a great portable solution, and for being a solid, reliable product. One year later, it's kept my Nissan Leaf and now a new Chevy Bolt charged up without any issues. My Leaf would take about 4 hours to charge overnight, and my Bolt now takes about 8 hours if empty.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Work great until it doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Normally it works fine and my Fusion charges in less than 2.5 hours. But it then stopped charging my car at all after only 8 months of normal use. The good thing is that customer service for Turbocord is 24/7. The bad thing is that I've already put a week into this (took car to dealer for troubleshooting) and it might be another week and a half before I receive a replacement. So irritating!!!. **Update** I received a replacement from the company and it works fine. I've added a star.
customer_reviews.author: PMac

customer_reviews.title: Did work for longFor me but it could have been my battery on the car
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for long For me but it could have been my battery on the car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price beats the other level 2 chargers. Well built and easy to use. BMW wanted $1,000 for their level 2 charger plus having to mount the unit in the garage. The TurboCord just plugs in and is so inconspicuous and small that it doesn't need any mounting hardware unless you want to mount the cord hanger to coil the cord on.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A solid portable charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable 240v EV charger. It comes with a NEMA 6-20p plug. You will need to install a matching 6-20R socket from a 16A dedicated circuit. Comparing to the 120v charger, it reduces charging time by a half. Very useful if your utility rate schedule is time-based. The product is well built and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Glad we found them
customer_reviews.text: Our CMAX Energi charges in just under 2 hours.Great product. Their sales support was great. We learned the CMAX wouldn't charge any faster with the more expensive product. Glad we found them and appreciate their helpful information..
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I use it just in the days when ...
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I use it just in the days when I have a lot of driving Is nice to be able to be full charge in 2 -3 hours after a long trip and continue with your daily rutine
customer_reviews.author: Ondin Roman

customer_reviews.title: Dead before a year was over.
customer_reviews.text: Broke less than a year after we bought it. But, it was great while it lasted. The cord tends to get kinked and wrapped around itself regardless of how you try to keep it from being a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Darden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with this. This functions as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Get charged up fast
customer_reviews.text: My new Volt now charges up quickly and the cord length allows me to part in several spots in the garage. Arrived quickly and works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: a few years later
customer_reviews.text: functions well except the cord tangles and kinks easily--would give 5 stars with a better quality cord. checking back in a few years later. the unit died 3 months after the warranty ended, and there's no repair, so it had to be discarded.
customer_reviews.author: photomf

customer_reviews.title: The TurboCord was recommended by an electrician who
customer_reviews.text: The TurboCord was recommended by an electrician who, much to our delight, told us we didn't need to incur the expense of installing a special, new electric line to charge our new Volt because the TurboCord works with our existing line. It does, and it re-charges the Volt much more rapidly than the charger that came with the car.
customer_reviews.author: 2bobs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product backed up by incredible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TurboCord for over 5 months now and it's been nearly perfect. The only blemish on its record is a power surge that destroyed it a few weeks ago. I got in touch with customer service though and they overnighted me a new one free of charge. Customer service could not have been easier and more pleasant to deal with which is pretty rare these days. I highly recommend this product to anyone needing a Level 2 charging option at home or on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Nowakowski

customer_reviews.title: Its plug and play so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and solid. Its plug and play so easy to use. Mine is plugged inside the garage so don't know about it's waterproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Vinz

customer_reviews.title: device works fine. There is a charging problem when I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Appropriate cord length;device works fine. There is a charging problem when I have a charge time set in my Pacific: it doesn't always start charging. But that is a Chrysler problem, not the TurboChord.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Terrific car charger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charger for my new Chevy Volt (2016), and have been very happy with it. I like the fact it's not a charging "station," it's simply a cord that rides in the back of the car. It's portable and easy to use. I park my car in the driveway, not a garage, and it's good to know it's rated for use even in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: texasdem

customer_reviews.title: Quick charge your electric vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone who needs to charge their electric car with this higher voltage cord. We had an electrician install the 220 line so we could charge our a Prius Prime in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: diane gehringer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The cord could be longer but other than that - it is a perfect product
customer_reviews.author: Nastassia Prakharenka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! We have our charging station all set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We have our charging station all set up. Free one-day shipping was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: L Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for the $$$. Beats the others by at least $50.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality charger for $500. The other comparable types from Leviton and Chargepoint may look fancier but they all do the same thing. The added bonus on this one is that is it very compact. You don't need a huge attachment to mount on the wall. I just have it next to my outlet can move it very easily since space in my garage is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Startup Valuer

customer_reviews.title: It would be 5 Stars if it was not for ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit failed after 4 months of use. However, Customer Service support was outstanding. Got an immediate replacement shipped the same day. They stand by their 3 year warranty without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: VPTSAN

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it quit working in about one month. The manufacturer replaced it right away and the second has been working for over one year now. I do think it is way overpriced, $100 would be more like it not the $500 that is being charged.
customer_reviews.author: Harry T.

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase, is a very reliable cord
customer_reviews.author: rigadel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product! Perfect for my Volt. I returned mine, because my son gifted this to me for Christmas. 3 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Jung

customer_reviews.title: Works well, compact
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to ask for a duplex NEMA 6-20 outlet. Electricians won’t always have one with them. Don’t let on that it’s for an electric vehicle charger, just tell them what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Affordable compact 240v charger
customer_reviews.text: I chose this plug because of the cost. Item is small and portable. Called an electrician and added a NEMA plug that piggy backs off my dryer outlet. Set my Volt to charge after hours when we don't use the dryer. It remains plugged in while dryer is running with no issues, as long as car is not charging. Works better than expected and charges my Volt in less than 4 hours compared to the 9 hours using the 110v default charger.
customer_reviews.author: jazekid

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, used daily outside for almost a year now on my 2014 Volt. Blinking light on power-plug lets me know from the garage what the car is doing outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this cord
customer_reviews.text: Love this cord. Gone are the days of 20+ hours to charge my LEAF! I plug it before I go to bed and it is 100% charged and ready to go in the morning. Not sure how long it takes yet. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jam

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. We did need to hire an electrician to run the 220 line, which was about $200. This gem cut our charging time in half, plus we avoided installing one of those big bulky wall units.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for several months and this thing is great...highly recommend. The only thing close to a "problem" is that it has stopped charging on two occasions due to over-heating because of really hot weather. Called customer service and they were very very friendly and noted that if the problem seems to continue they'll send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Wolfe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Quick charger
customer_reviews.text: Quickly delivered, this charger plugged into my new 240 outlet and then into the car, charged the Volt in less than 4 hours. Exactly what we needed. Do not know yet about longevity. So far, great.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cedarholm

customer_reviews.title: The cord was not long enough and the part that ...
customer_reviews.text: The cord was not long enough and the part that attach to the car, would not lock in to charge the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bushong

customer_reviews.title: If you have an EV - you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charging cable and even more excellent customer service from AeroVironment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my BMW I3. I get a full charge in about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bruck

customer_reviews.title: I use this one for both my Kia Soul EV ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this one for both my Kia Soul EV and my Tesla. After having the technician install the outlet, all I do is plug in and let it charge overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Masc

customer_reviews.title: Great EV power cord
customer_reviews.text: Bought for charging Fusion Energi, charging time cut from 9 hours down to 2.5 hours. Worked as advertised and very happy with product. The cord is shorter than some other products so verify your distance between car and outlets. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Zottola

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as stated. Good quality. My charge time went from 14 to 15 hours to 3 to 4 hours in my BMW i3. I chose to get the 240v only option as it was a little cheaper and the car comes with a 120v so why pay extra to get a charge cable that does both.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: convemient but time will tell about the quality.
customer_reviews.text: For this amount of money I expected something a little more 'sturdy'. I hope it lasts longer than a year of daily use.. Not even a cap/cover provided.
customer_reviews.author: g.y.

customer_reviews.title: good alternative to the other options at a highly reduced ...
customer_reviews.text: good alternative to the other options at a highly reduced price - does require some installation costs with an electrician - doesn't quite get the same charge as the 110v accessory that comes wit the car, but much quicker. good alternative - I would highly suggest that any Volt purchaser, or other E car buyer look to this rather than the alternatives promoted by the dealers.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Muffoletto

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charger for Plug-in EV
customer_reviews.text: We bought the TurboCord 240 to charge our 2015 Ford Fusion Energi. It works as expected with a dedicated 240 volt circuit cutting our charge time in half compared to the 120 volt cord that Ford provided with the vehicle. This is a good alternative to the more expensive charging stations that are available.
customer_reviews.author: MH in GA

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, and relatively inexpensive to boot
customer_reviews.text: Charges our Chevy Volt 3x faster than the stock 120V charger. Nice design, and relatively inexpensive to boot! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Berner

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased Charges my Ford C Max in about 2 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased Charges my Ford C Max in about 2 and a half hours compared to seven and a half on 110V
customer_reviews.author: David Sletten

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Ford Focus Electric
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ford Focus Electric. It charges much faster than it did from the regular outlet charger that came with the car. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Charges 2014 C-Max Energi
customer_reviews.text: Use it to charge 2014 C-max Energi. Will charge complete in a little over 2 hours. Takes a special plug receptacle, which I found at my local HomeDepot for around $5. A little costly, but works great....
customer_reviews.author: S. Penman

customer_reviews.title: Very fast charger and well built
customer_reviews.text: I have owned it for three months now and it works perfectly. It's construction also looks to be of high qualtity and durability. I use it to charge a 2014 Ford Fusion Energi. It will charge the car in approx 1 hour and 45 min.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for awhile and it’s worked out great Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Faster charge on our LEAF
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a Nissan LEAF and this charger works great and charges the car in about 4-6 hours... so much quicker than the 110v charger that came with the car. We had a 240v outlet installed in the garage and now can charge the car so it is ready of commute everyday.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for our 2013 Chevy volt just wish they ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for our 2013 Chevy volt just wish they were more connection plugs as this is quite rare we can't use it when outside the home
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fast charger, works with 2017 Volt
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with our 2017 Volt, we get a full charge in about 4 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to change out the outlet to fit the charger
customer_reviews.author: Brisa Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Charges at least 3X faster than straight 110V.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my iMiev
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my iMiev. It does what it is intended to do, which is to charge my little car.
customer_reviews.author: ttang10131

customer_reviews.title: ... TurboCord for about 1 month now and it works great. Much better than the trickle charging cord that ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the TurboCord for about 1 month now and it works great. Much better than the trickle charging cord that came with my Nissan Leaf!
customer_reviews.author: Elias Bermudez Jr

customer_reviews.title: works straight away
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to work fine. Will see if it holds up
customer_reviews.author: opinion skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: So far works well with our Nissan Leaf. But it’s only been is use for three months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Largoza

customer_reviews.title: I had a Electrician install a 240 outlet and charging ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Electrician install a 240 outlet and charging time went from 13 hrs to 4.5 hrs recharging drained battery. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is easy to unplug and take it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to charge my Chevy Volt. Works great and is easy to unplug and take it to work everyday. Much faster than the 110v charger that came with my car.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Cord- Charge FAST!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! It charges my LEAF faster than 110 outlet. No installation required except for the cord hanger. It doesn't have predrilled holes & screws that came with it. Cord needed to be longer! Ordering on Amazon took longer than direct product website.
customer_reviews.author: BRANNGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for our plug in Prius. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Berry-Had-a-Little-Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small size easy to wire up The cord gets hot during charging
customer_reviews.author: Sreenivasan Kotay

customer_reviews.title: Great step up over Level 1
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, easy hook up as my breaker box is in the garage A whole lot better than Level 1. Took over 12 hours on Level 1 charge and now its down to 3.75-4 hours to charge my Chevy Volt.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This charger works great and is very fast
customer_reviews.text: I own a Ford C-Max Energi. This charger works great and is very fast. I can fully charge my car in about 2 hours. Really easy to use but does take an unusual plug not a typical 220 "dryer" outlet.
customer_reviews.author: sean nikas

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It is well designed, compact, portable, well built and easy to use. I only wish they went to the full Level 2 30A charging speed.This unit is limited to 16A at 240V, which is probably a tradeoff between weight, size, portability and charging speed. However I only use it at home and later decided to install also Siemens VC30GRYU Versicharge 30-Amp Electric Vehicle Charger, which is a fixed unit with additional functionality, but the handle does not quite give the same feeling of quality and precision of fabrication, but gives the additional speed that I desire
customer_reviews.author: Serge R Lafontaine

customer_reviews.title: it's good
customer_reviews.text: Charges my volt daily. Quickest charge and easy to plug in and store
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This plug is the best. Electrician put in the special 240 plug, cost 175.00. Charges car in less than 4 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Charges in less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My fusion fully charges in less than 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my Electric Car. This Charger works really great. It is everything the Ads say it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... chevy volt and this is compact and does a great job charging the car in 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: luv it just purchased a chevy volt and this is compact and does a great job charging the car in 3 hours. the electrian that istalled the outlet was impressed and was going to tell his brother about the turbocord because he also owns a volt would reccommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: jame m hudak

customer_reviews.title: Not a level 1 and not a Level 2, in between
customer_reviews.text: I works as advertised and is very compact. I have an BMW i3 Rex and this charger does not charge as fast as a Level 2. However, I do NOT see a significant speed in charging over the 110V unit that comes free with the car. I would rather have bought the Siemens 30Amp for less money than this one. This unit is 15amp @ 220 which makes is The main purpose for buying this was to take at along with me, however, my brother and friends do not have 220 dryer connections, seems only house build after 1970's at least in California have gas dryer hookups.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: so good. As described
customer_reviews.text: So far ,so good. As described, not bulky, very portable and gets the job done. I'm surprised they did not use a heavier cord for 500.00.
customer_reviews.author: john prokopiuk

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this if you have an EV
customer_reviews.text: light and very convenient. I definitely recommend this if you have an EV.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander D.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger works fantastically with my new circuit that was put in, and set of taking two hours to charge my i3 it takes about 3 1/2 hours I would definitely recommend it. The only thing I would do is to have some instructions on how to install the hanger for the cord. Screws are included but there are no holes in the cord storage hanger and there is no obvious place to put them.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCargar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable solution for EVs
customer_reviews.text: Using this TurboCord to charge a 2016 Ford Focus EV and it works perfectly. I had an electrician convert an existing outlet for a dryer into one that is compatible with the plug and a full charge that used to take ~18 hours now takes about 6 hours. Cord comes with a canvas bag which would be a nice way to transport it but I just leave it at home because the odds of finding a compatible plug while out and about would be slim I'm guessing. This is a great alternative to an installed charging station in my garage; if I move this guy can go with me--charging stations are more permanent.
customer_reviews.author: CKH

customer_reviews.title: Just as powerful as a built-in 240 Volt unit at 1/2 the price!
customer_reviews.text: Charges my Volt in about 3.5 to 4 hours. Make sure you get the 240 Volt wall unit plug and check the circuit breaker to make sure the Wattage drain is not too strong which could cause a fire. You may require a larger breaker on your electrical panel but it's a small price to pay for this exceptional unit. HIGHLY Recommended if you want FAST charging at your home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Moch

customer_reviews.title: Most of all I like that you can unplug it and take it with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine in the garage for about a year now. It is still working dependably every day. It charges my Volt in about 3 1/2 hours. Most of all I like that you can unplug it and take it with you to use at other locations. You can take it with you if you move, since it is not hardwired in.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Sept 2017. Accidentally dropped the plug and bent the prong on the 2nd day. Contacted Amazon and got it exchanged. Been very careful with the 2nd one. But today, Nov 2017, it started to intermittently disrupt the charging. Seems like the connector has loosen in the last 2 months. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: gjsk

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Electric Vehicle Owners
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest bang for the buck. Build quality is exceptional! Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Miller

customer_reviews.title: This AV Turbocord is fantastic. Charges my Fiat 500ein less than 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: This AV Turbocord is fantastic. Charges my Fiat 500ein less than 4 hours....
customer_reviews.author: Javad S.

customer_reviews.title: ... cord was a bit longer but this is a great
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cord was a bit longer but this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: it's free with $500 rebate from PSE.
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. especially when PSE will give $500 rebate.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 2 weeks until it stopped working altogether
customer_reviews.text: Great product for 2 weeks until it stopped working altogether. Doesn't appear to have damaged my receptacle or my vehicle, but the TurboCord is dead after about 12 charging sessions. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mekanaloke

customer_reviews.title: The unit has a NEMA 6-20 plug and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit has a NEMA 6-20 plug and it is difficult to get a well built plug in your Home D supply store. Could be an option for a retrofit to pull lower gauge wire. However - why do that and risk a fire in the garage. Unit appears to be a cheap build. Did not install or try it and returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Yadlapalli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item for your electric car
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised, cord length a plus, not bulky, not had it very long but it is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: David Ortiz

product_meta.title: TurboCord 240V Portable EV Charger (16 Amps), UL-Listed
product_meta.description:
With TurboCord's lightweight, durable 20ft cable, it's at home charging on the road, or in your driveway. Installation costs are much lower than units that need to be hardwired directly into your home's electrical system and mounted permantenly on a wall. All you need is to install a NEMA 6-20 outlet. 

Safe & Reliable UL-listed and tested to meet the strict safety standards, including those of our automaker partners. Your computer, refrigerator, television and other household electronics are UL-listed – shouldn’t your charger be too? Plus, TurboCord can be used indoor or outdoors thatnks to its industry-leading NEMA 6P rating. 

Innovation Webasto is a leading innovator in the electric vehicle charging market. As the first company to develop a small, portable, lightweight, UL-listed dual voltage charger - we know what it takes to build long-lasting, safe, and high-quality equipment. 

Support Webasto provides 24-hour call center support along with a 3-year warranty on parts and labor and a nationwide network of certified installation partners. What does this mean for you? We’re here for all of your installation, service, and support needs.
feature_bullets: OFFICIAL CHARGING PARTNER OF AUTOMAKERS: Webasto is the ONLY official charging station provider of Ford, Nissan, Fiat, Kia, Hyundai, Mitsubishi, Volvo, and BMW. Choose the company that has been vetted, tested and received the stamp of approval for your car.

UL-LISTED SO YOU KNOW IT’S SAFE: All EV charging companies are not the same. Don’t risk buying a charger that does not meet current safety requirements. All of Webasto’s chargers are UL-listed, meet strict safety standards and have undergone rigorous testing by automakers

PORTABLE, RELIABLE, ON-THE-GO CHARGING: Quickly charge your EV up to 3x faster than with the standard cord set that came with your car. Enjoy the power of a Level 2 (16 amps) charger that fits in the palm of your hand. TurboCord is rugged and durable so you can reliably charger anywhere, even outdoors

SIMPLE, PAIN-FREE INSTALLATION: Plug TurboCord 240V into a NEMA 6-20 outlet (installation required) for Level 2 charging. TurboCord doesn’t require mounting and fits in a backpack while charging up to 3x faster.
